title: You Can't Miss Monique Lhuillier's Dazzling Runway Show
content:
POPSUGAR Fashion Monique Lhuillier Monique Lhuillier Spring 2016 Collection You Can't Miss Monique Lhuillier's Dazzling Runway Show by Allison McNamara 9/13/15 15 Shares Like us on Facebook Sign up for our daily newsletter > When you think of Monique Lhuillier, beautiful ballgowns and bridal might come to mind. But this season, she is shaking things up — and there isn't a princess-style ballgown in sight on her Spring 2016 runway. Her entire collection is fun, youthful, modern, and everything we want to wear next season. See for yourself — take a look!
